long_description: The Leatherman Rebar multitool offers a cornucopia of useful functions in a small and slim design. Enjoy all the features you need to get tough jobs done in the great outdoors or in your garage. Dual locking blades (1 straight and 1 serrated) are made of 420HC stainless steel. Rebar features regular and needlenose pliers, replaceable wire cutters and hard-wire cutters, electrical crimper, Phillips screwdriver and large and small flat screwdrivers. The Leatherman Rebar multitool also includes a wood/metal file, saw, awl with thread loop, bottle and can openers, wire stripper and lanyard ring.
short_description: The Leatherman Rebar multitool offers a cornucopia of useful functions in a small and slim design. Enjoy all the features you need to get tough jobs done in the great outdoors or in your garage.
